subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The agreement was reached around 5 a.m. at a Midtown Manhattan hotel after a 16-hour negotiating session. Pending ratification by the players and owners, a 48- to 50-game schedule is expected to begin before Jan. 20.
